title: How to unsubscribe from SWEET.TV
description: Learn how to cancel your SWEET.TV subscription. The process varies depending on how you signed up (website, Google Play, Apple App Store, Roku, or Amazon). Your access will continue until the end of your current billing cycle.

steps_1.title: Cancel via Website or App
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Sweet TV subscription, follow these steps:

*   Log in to your SWEET.TV account on their website or app.
*   Go to the settings or account management section.
*   Find the 'Manage Subscription' option.
*   Select the 'Cancel Subscription' option.
*   Confirm your cancellation request.
*   Check for a confirmation email to ensure your subscription has been successfully cancelled.

steps_2.title: Cancel via Google Play Store
steps_2.description:
If you subscribed through Google Play, cancel as follows:

*   Open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Tap 'Payments & subscriptions', then 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select SWEET.TV to cancel.

steps_3.title: Cancel via Apple App Store
steps_3.description:
If you subscribed through the Apple App Store, cancel as follows:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap 'Subscriptions'.
*   Select SWEET.TV to cancel.

seo_text: Cancel SWEET.TV subscription, unsubscribe from SWEET.TV, SWEET.TV cancellation, end SWEET.TV subscription, manage SWEET.TV subscription, Google Play SWEET.TV cancellation, Apple App Store SWEET.TV cancellation
